name: Project Spacefarers
description:
This is an early prototype, expect bugs, usability issues and many missing sounds and features.

Current features include:
One star system with two stations and one planet.
Minimap for navigating around the system.
Physics-based ship movement system for travelling around the star system.
Contract collection and delivery system.
Upgrade system using credits earned from completing contracts.
Weapon system with lasers and unlockable missiles.
Destructible debris.
Ship health & overheating system.
